item.title: #TIL 2017-08-06 : Runing old java applets on brower
item.description: Runing old java applets on brower Mostly morden browser has stop support Java plugins, so you can’t run Java applet on browser. Temporary way : - run in IE or Safari - run in an old Firefox (version 23) And what if old java applet can’t be runned on Java 8 because of weak signature algorithm. Try this Open java.security file : In MacOS, located in /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk[jdk-version].jdk/Contents/Home/jre/lib/security In Windows, located in C:\Program File x86\Java\jre\lib\security Comment this line, jdk.
